trans-unit.source: Represents the information needed by an event handler to perform custom processing whenever the contents of an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection"></xref> changes.
trans-unit.target: Reprezentuje informacje wymagane przez program obsługi zdarzeń do wykonywania niestandardowego przetwarzania po każdej zmianie zawartości <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection"> </xref> zmiany.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Aby uzyskać więcej informacji na temat obsługi zdarzeń, zobacz [NIB: Korzystanie z zdarzenia](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs"></xref> class.
The index of the change within the subject <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Indeks o zmianie w ramach podmiot <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A strongly typed <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> of type <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> containing each removed <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.

A strongly typed <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> of type <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> containing each added <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Object> which originated the event.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeAction"></xref> corresponding to the event.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs"></xref> class.
The index of the change within the subject <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Indeks o zmianie w ramach podmiot <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> which was removed from the collection.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> which was added to the collection.
The <xref:System.Object> which originated the event.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeAction"></xref> corresponding to the event.
Gets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeAction"></xref> representing the type of change that occurred.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeAction"> </xref> reprezentujący typ zmiany, który wystąpił.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeAction"></xref> representing the type of change that occurred.

Gets a strongly typed <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> of type <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> containing each added <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera silnie typizowaną <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>typu <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> zawierający każdego dodane <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: A strongly typed <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> of type <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> containing each added <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
Gets the index of the change originating the event.
The index of the change originating the event.
Gets the <xref:System.Object> which originated the event.

Gets a strongly typed <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> of type <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> containing each removed <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera silnie typizowaną <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>typu <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> zawierający każdego usunięte <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: A strongly typed <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> of type <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> containing each removed <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
